Changeset.Change: Changed query request to FulltextIndex from GET to POST
Extended to support REST calls to SRU Datasources
Extended to support REST calls to OpenSearchDatasource
Extended to support REST calls to FullTextIndex
Extended to search with security identifiers at FullTextIndex datasources

Modularized Data Source Wrappers. GCube wrappers included in workflow Search Adaptor for now. Data Source Wrappers are instantiated via configurable factory. GCube Wrappers are selected by default. Scope is included in environmental hints. Renamed OpenSearchServiceWrapper to OpenSearchDataSourceWrapper. Removed old node selection and collocation policy classes.
Wrappers and element constructors support buffer capacity limiting
Implemented search plan analyzer, rewriter, started optimizer

Fully distributed execution using node selection and assignment policies. Local or single remote execution of simple plans. Max collocation preferred for more complex plans. Highly configurable through parameters: OperatorNodeSelectorThreshold MaxCollocationCost DatasourceNodeSelector DatasourceNodeSelectorTieBreaker OperatorNodeSelector OperatorNodeSelectorTieBreaker NodeAssignmentPolicy ExcludeLocal
Fixed merge operator wrapper input array handling so that it works correctly for remote execution using the new ParameterArrayEvaluationFilter. Fixed bug in OpenSearch DataSource service wrapper.
A more descriptive exception is thrown upon attempting to contact a missing data source
First Release. Converts abstract search plans to execution plans
